member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfGenerator
member.summary: Draws a . Each is associated with a specific derivative of GoObject via the property, and must be registered with the being used. Generators for all types of standard GoObjects are provided, and can be registered by calling . Custom GoObjects may need a custom generator. Custom drawing can be performed by calling any of a set of predefined drawing functions, which take a specified Pen and/or Brush, and coordinates in coordinates.

member.summary: Draw per-page decorations, watermark, page numbers, etc... Cordinates are expressed in units of 1/72 inch, with (0,0) denoting the top left corner.

A set of values for various attributes of the page.

member.summary: associate a with a Type

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.Scale
member.summary: The number of PDF units corresponding to a single unit. 72 PDF units correspond to an inch.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.RendersBackground
member.summary: Specifies whether the 's background color should be drawn. Default is false.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.RendersGrid
member.summary: Specifies whether the 's Grid should be rendered, if it exists. Default is false.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.RendersFullPage
member.summary: Specifies whether the Background color and grid, if drawn, should extend to the margins of the pages. Default is false.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.RenderTemporaryObjects
member.summary: Specifies whether temporary objects (e.g. adornments, tooltips,...) should be rendered. Default is false.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.RendersShadows
member.summary: Controls whether s with shadows will have a shadow rendered onto the document

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.Landscape
member.summary: Specifies the orientation of the diagram when printed onto a page. If true, means that the longer dimension of the page should be horizontal for the y-axis of the diagram to be vertical. Default is false.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.MajorRows
member.summary: True if pages are numbered such that a row consists of consecutive page numbers, false if pages are numbered such that columns consist of consecutive page numbers. Default is true.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.CompressContentStreams
member.summary: Specifies whether the document's content streams should be compressed to reduce file size.
member.remarks: Images will be compressed regardless of the value of this property

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.Metadata
member.summary: Specifies general information about the PDF document, such as Author, Title, Date of creation, etc...

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.Alignment
member.summary: Controls how the diagram should be rendered if there is more space than needed (e.g., whether it should be stretched to fill the pages, whether it should be centered,...)

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.Padding
member.summary: The minimum distances (in inches) between the bounds of the diagram and tha pages' margins.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.Margins
member.summary: The minimum printable distances (in inches) from the sides ofn a page. This property determines the pages' trim box.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.View
member.summary: The whose contents are drawn.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.Bounds
member.summary: Only s within these bounds will be added to the PDF document.
member.remarks: If NaN or Infinity, no restrictions based on location are used.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.Objects
member.summary: The s to be drawn onto the PDF Document.
member.remarks: If null, All s will be rendered.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfWriter.PageSize
member.summary: The size, in inches, of a page.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of based on the parameter values.

member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfAlignment
member.summary: Flags specifying how extra space is dealt with. Horizontal and vertical alignments are separate, and a combination of horizontal alignment and vertical alignment can be specified as HorizontalAlignment|VerticalAlignment

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfAlignment.Center
member.summary: Indicates that the drawing should be centered in the available space.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfAlignment.Left
member.summary: A horizontal alignment flag indicating that the drawing should be as far to the left as posible

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfAlignment.Right
member.summary: A horizontal alignment flag indicating that the drawing should be as far to the roght as possible

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfAlignment.Top
member.summary: A vertical alignment flag indicating that the drawing should be as far to the top as possible.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfAlignment.Bottom
member.summary: A vertical alignment flag indicating that the drawing should be as far to the bottom as possible.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfAlignment.HStretch
member.summary: A horizontal flag indicating the drawing should be stretched to occupy the entirety of the available horizontal space.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfAlignment.VStretch
member.summary: A vertical flag indicating the drawing should be stretched to occupy the entirety of the available vertical space.

member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfMetadata
member.summary: Represents general information about a PDF document.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfMetadata.Title
member.summary: The title of the resulting PDF document. A value of null means the document has no title.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfMetadata.DateCreated
member.summary: The date/time at which the document is created. The default value is the current date/time.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfMetadata.DateModified
member.summary: The date/time at which the document was last modified. The default value is the current date/time.

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfMetadata.Author
member.summary: The authors of the PDF document

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfMetadata.Producer
member.summary: The producer of the PDF document

member.name: F:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfMetadata.Subject
member.summary: The subject of the document.

member.name: T:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo
member.summary: Contains values for various attributes of a page in a PDF document.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.Column
member.summary: Gets a one-based index of the current page in the total ColumnCount of pages to be printed for each row.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.ColumnCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages to be printed in each row.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.Count
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages to be printed.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.View
member.summary: Gets a reference to the GoView being printed

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.Index
member.summary: Gets a one-based index of the current page in the total Count of pages to be printed.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.PageBounds
member.summary: Gets the bounds, in document coordinates, of the whole page being printed.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.Row
member.summary: Gets a one-based index of the current page in the total RowCount of pages to be printed for each column.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.RowCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages to be printed in each column.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.ScaleX
member.summary: Gets the actual scale at which the diagram is being printed.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.ScaleY
member.summary: Gets the actual scale at which the diagram is being printed.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of the current page, in device-independent pixels.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.TotalDocumentBounds
member.summary: Gets the bounds, in document coordinates, of the total area of the diagram being printed.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.Viewport
member.summary: Gets the size and location of the diagram area (within the margins), in device-independent pixels.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.ViewportBounds
member.summary: Gets the bounds, in document coordinates, of the area being printed for this page.

member.name: P:Northwoods.Go.Pdf.GoPdfPageInfo.Matrix
member.summary: A matrix mapping the Document's coord. system to that of the pdf page
